channel.title: How to get IRC set up
channel.description:
Is there a proper guide anywhere that explains how to actually use irc, and what is what, I might be from the IRC generation but I can't seem to grasp the concepts.
And yes I'm aware 0x00 has no irc.

item.title: How to get IRC set up
item.dc:creator: system
item.description:
This topic was automatically closed 3 days after the last reply. New replies are no longer allowed.

Read full topic
item.source: How to get IRC set up
